channel.title: xylem | Gordon Beeming
channel.description: Gordon Beeming - Father • Husband • Triathlete • SSW Solution Architect

item.title: Connecting agents to TFS using integrated security on http from external domain
item.description: If you have TFS on the domain but you are trying to connect agents to it from outside the domain and TFS is not running on https then this post is for you.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Searching in VSTS/TFS
item.description: This post is largely showing off a cool feature of chrome but the core focus is how you can be more productive with VSTS search
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Turning on the new navigation for Visual Studio Team Services
item.description: Although I'm hoping everyone reading this doesn't need this I thought I'd share anyway. A little under a month ago Jeremy Epling (@jeremy_epling) posted on the Microsoft DevOps Blog about the New Navigation for Visual Studio Team Services. I'm not going to repeat the very detailed blog post but I am going to show you how to enabled the amazing experience quickly.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: #TYMHKON: What is it?
item.description: TYMHKON is something random that to me looks like it could be Japanese? Not sure what makes me think that when seeing it but what it really stands for is Things You May Have Known Or Not!
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
